sourcesContent:
import { Caption, Heading, Paragraph } from "../../components/Text";

import Form from "../../components/Form";
import Grid from "../../components/Grid";
import React from "react";
import Section from "../../components/Section";

export default () => (
	<React.Fragment>
		<Section>
			<Grid as="form">
				<Form.Group>
					<Heading>Contact Us</Heading>
					<Paragraph>
						Got a question? Don't hesitate to get in touch with us
						using the contact form provided.
					</Paragraph>
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Group>
					<Caption as="label" for="name">
						Your Name
					</Caption>
					<Form.Input
						name="name"
						type="text"
						placeholder="e.g. John Doe"
					/>
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Group>
					<Caption as="label" for="subject">
						Subject
					</Caption>
					<Form.Input name="subject" type="text" />
				</Form.Group>
				<Form.Group>
					<Caption as="label" for="body">
						Message
					</Caption>
					<Form.Input
						as="textarea"
						name="body"
						style={{
							height: "auto",
							resize: "vertical",
							minHeight: "120px",
							maxHeight: "300px",
						}}
					/>
				</Form.Group>
			</Grid>
		</Section>
	</React.Fragment>
);
